LanguageData.Outposts.Settings.WorkToDrill: Time To Drill (Needs to happen before production starts)
LanguageData.Outposts.Settings.NeedPods: Need Transport Pods Tech to Deploy Reinforcements?
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Fire.Label: Artillery Strike
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Fire.Desc: Begin targeting for an artillery strike
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.Intercept.Label: Raid Intercepted
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.Intercept.Text: A raid bound for {0} has been intercepted by the defensive outpost {0}. Hopefully they can survive this brave maneuver.
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Deploy.Label: Send Reinforcements
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Deploy.Desc: Deploy the garrison of this outpost in drop pods to assist one of your combat engagements.
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Deploy.Disabled: Cannot send: Drop pods are not available to you
LanguageData.Outposts.Drilling: Drilling boreholes. {0} done. Estimated time remaining: {1}
LanguageData.Outposts.MustBeMade.Hill: Must be made in mountains or hills
LanguageData.Outposts.NearbySettlements: Not enough nearby settlements, need {0} within {1} tiles
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.Recruit.Label: Pawns Recruited: {0}
LanguageData.Outposts.Letters.Recruit.Desc: The following pawns have been newly recruited in the town of {0}:\n{1}
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Factory.Label: Change Factory
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Factory.Desc: Change which factory building this outpost uses to produce items for you
LanguageData.Outposts.Commands.Comb.Label: Change Result
LanguageData.Outposts.MustBeOnCoastOrRiver: Must be made on the coast or a river
LanguageData.Outposts.MustBeArmed: All occupants must be armed and ready for combat.
LanguageData.Outposts.WillProduce.Pawns: May recruit some new pawns in {0}
LanguageData.Outposts.Defensive.Won.Label: Raid Ambush Won
LanguageData.Outposts.Defensive.Won.Desc: Your soldiers have successfully defeated the incoming raid before it could reach your settlement.
LanguageData.Outposts.Defensive.Lost.Label: Raid Ambush Lost
LanguageData.Outposts.Defensive.Lost.Desc: Your soldiers have been defeated whilst ambushing a raid targetting your settlement. Luckily, the raiders have been discouraged by your audacity and have decided to return home without continuing on to your settlement. Your soldiers' sacrifice is not in vain.
